description: Retrieves a fresh set of credentials for use when uploading a new set of game build files to Amazon GameLift's Amazon S3. This is done as part of the build creation process; see CreateBuild. To request new credentials, specify the build ID as returned with an initial CreateBuild request. If successful, a new set of credentials are returned, along with the S3 storage location associated with the build ID.  Learn more   Uploading Your Game   Related operations     CreateBuild     ListBuilds     DescribeBuild     UpdateBuild     DeleteBuild
